subject: Re: [junit] reports in junit
msgSnippet: ... Didn t we already answer that? Word can open HTML documents automatically. If you need it in Word format, then Save As... -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
messageBody:
Balraj Goulikar wrote:
> Hi All,
>
> Had a query about getting JUnit reports in word document format. There is an
> ant task to get it in html but not in rtf or word document. Any way to
> convert that?

Didn't we already answer that? Word can open HTML documents
automatically. If you need it in Word format, then Save As...
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
2005 Gordon Pask Award Winner for contribution to Agile practice
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
